data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. # K 4 FJ The image shows a sequence of characters "K 4 FJ" on a yellow background. The text is bold and black, standing out against the bright background. ## Text Der K 4 FJ ist ideal für die regelmäßige Reinigung bei mittelstarken Verschmutzungen an Autos sowie Wegen und Flächen rund ums Haus. Inkl. Schaumdüse. ## Description The image shows a pressure washer set, which includes several components: - **Pressure Washer Unit**: The main unit is predominantly yellow with black accents. It has a handle for easy transport and large wheels for mobility. The front features a vented design, likely for cooling purposes. - **Spray Gun**: Attached to the main unit is a black and yellow spray gun, which is used to direct the water flow. - **Lances**: Two different lances are included, each designed for specific cleaning tasks. One appears to be a standard lance, while the other has a more pointed end, possibly for more concentrated cleaning. - **Hose**: A coiled black hose is present, which connects the spray gun to the main unit, allowing for water flow. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of detergent is included, likely for use with the pressure washer to enhance cleaning effectiveness. - **Foam Nozzle**: A small attachment, possibly a foam nozzle, is included for applying detergent in a foamy consistency. This set is designed for cleaning tasks, such as washing vehicles, driveways, or outdoor furniture, providing a comprehensive solution for various cleaning needs. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.679-561.0 ## Technische Daten - **EAN-Code**: 4066529154606 - **Stromart**: V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60 - **Druck**: bar 20 - max. 130 - **Fördermenge**: l/h max. 420 - **Flächenleistung**: m²/h 30 - **Zulauftemperatur**: °C max. 40 - **Anschlussleistung**: W 1800 - **Anschlusskabel**: m 5 - **Farbe**: gelb - **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: kg 5,7 - **Gewicht inkl. Verpackung**: kg 9,4 - **Abmessungen (L × B × H)**: mm 302 × 346 × 872 ## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Schaumdüse [x]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo 3-in-1 RM 610
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugung
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
- **Note**: [x] indicates a filled checkbox or radio button. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white uppercase letters on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white. Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with a gold background. This section contains the text "RECORD HOLDER" in uppercase white letters. The overall design conveys a sense of achievement and prestige associated with holding a world record. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation featuring a large number "1" on the left side, partially visible in a light gray color. Overlapping the number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, there is bold black text that reads: - "WORLD'S NO. 1" - "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" This suggests a promotional or advertising message, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market for pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold text and bright colors is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trustworthiness. ## Figure Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag: black, red, and yellow. The design is a stylized representation of the flag, with the colors arranged in a diagonal pattern. Below the flag, the text "Made in Germany" is displayed. The text is centered and uses a simple, sans-serif font. The overall design conveys the origin of a product, emphasizing its German manufacturing. ## Figure Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt, indicating electrical power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased or full power capacity. ## Figure Description The image is a symbol representing "Vario Power." It features a stylized icon of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable spray pattern. The nozzle is depicted with a plus sign, indicating an increase in power or intensity. Below the icon, the text "VARIO POWER" is displayed in uppercase letters. The background is black, and the text and icon are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This symbol likely indicates a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power or intensity of the water spray.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

# K 4 FJ

The image shows a sequence of characters "K 4 FJ" on a yellow background. The text is bold and black, standing out against the bright background.

## Text

Der K 4 FJ ist ideal für die regelmäßige Reinigung bei mittelstarken Verschmutzungen an Autos sowie Wegen und Flächen rund ums Haus. Inkl. Schaumdüse.

## Description

The image shows a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

- **Pressure Washer Unit**: The main unit is predominantly yellow with black accents. It has a handle for easy transport and large wheels for mobility. The front features a vented design, likely for cooling purposes.

- **Spray Gun**: Attached to the main unit is a black and yellow spray gun, which is used to direct the water flow.

- **Lances**: Two different lances are included, each designed for specific cleaning tasks. One appears to be a standard lance, while the other has a more pointed end, possibly for more concentrated cleaning.

- **Hose**: A coiled black hose is present, which connects the spray gun to the main unit, allowing for water flow.

- **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of detergent is included, likely for use with the pressure washer to enhance cleaning effectiveness.

- **Foam Nozzle**: A small attachment, possibly a foam nozzle, is included for applying detergent in a foamy consistency.

This set is designed for cleaning tasks, such as washing vehicles, driveways, or outdoor furniture, providing a comprehensive solution for various cleaning needs.

## Technische Daten - **EAN-Code**: 4066529154606 - **Stromart**: V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60 - **Druck**: bar 20 - max. 130 - **Fördermenge**: l/h max. 420 - **Flächenleistung**: m²/h 30 - **Zulauftemperatur**: °C max. 40 - **Anschlussleistung**: W 1800 - **Anschlusskabel**: m 5 - **Farbe**: gelb - **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: kg 5,7 - **Gewicht inkl. Verpackung**: kg 9,4 - **Abmessungen (L × B × H)**: mm 302 × 346 × 872 ## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Schaumdüse [x]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo 3-in-1 RM 610
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugung
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
- **Note**: [x] indicates a filled checkbox or radio button.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white uppercase letters on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white. 

Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with a gold background. This section contains the text "RECORD HOLDER" in uppercase white letters. The overall design conveys a sense of achievement and prestige associated with holding a world record.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation featuring a large number "1" on the left side, partially visible in a light gray color. Overlapping the number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, there is bold black text that reads:

- "WORLD'S NO. 1"
- "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND"

This suggests a promotional or advertising message, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market for pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold text and bright colors is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trustworthiness.

## Figure Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag: black, red, and yellow. The design is a stylized representation of the flag, with the colors arranged in a diagonal pattern. Below the flag, the text "Made in Germany" is displayed. The text is centered and uses a simple, sans-serif font. The overall design conveys the origin of a product, emphasizing its German manufacturing.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt, indicating electrical power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased or full power capacity.

## Figure Description

The image is a symbol representing "Vario Power." It features a stylized icon of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable spray pattern. The nozzle is depicted with a plus sign, indicating an increase in power or intensity. Below the icon, the text "VARIO POWER" is displayed in uppercase letters. The background is black, and the text and icon are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This symbol likely indicates a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power or intensity of the water spray.
